Decentralized User Data Collection on a Blockchain

Insights Network is a market research technology where individuals earn money to publish their data while maintaining their anonimity

  • Watch Video
  • Read Whitepaper

Scroll Down

Key Features

Own Your Information

You choose exactly what information you want to be seen, only you have the keys. Your profile information is never shown individually, only in aggregate with other participants.

Get Paid for Answering Questions

Companies and researchers ask questions that you may be eligible to answer. When you answer a question, you will earn Insights Network Star Tokens.

See Real-Time Results

Get other peopleâ€™s answer to questions as they are answered. Answers will oftentimes have additional insights into interesting demographic trends.

How It Works

  1. Create a Profile
  2. Someone asks a question
  3. You answer questions
  4. You get paid

Use Cases

Market Research

Place data requests to find out how set demographics feel about your competitors. Send tokens for answers.

Sociology

Each user account is encrypted and data is split, encrypted, and sent across the network. This makes it impossible for any hacker to access your account and download all of your information.
